Ligue des Champions
Borussia Dortmund : Reus, forfait face √† l'Inter ?
L'attaquant allemand du Borussia Dortmund, Marco Reus est incertain pour le match de Ligue des Champions face √† l'Inter Milan.
04 Nov 2019, 21:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen : 8,5/10Tr√®s clairement l‚Äôhomme du match c√¥t√© barcelonais. D√®s le d√©but de la rencontre, il a remport√© un premier duel face √† Reus, comme pour annoncer la suite d‚Äôune performance XXL, en sortant au passage le penalty de Reus (encore) avec une facilit√© d√©concerte, puis en s‚Äôimposant en deux temps, toujours face au capitaine de Dortmund. Et quand il a √©t√© trop court, c‚Äôest sa barre transversale qui est venue le sauver sur la mine de Brandt qui s‚Äô√©crase sur le montant. D√©finitivement un des meilleurs au monde √† son poste.Icon Sport



Jordi Alba : Non not√©Moins offensif qu‚Äô√† l‚Äôaccoutum√©e, l‚Äôinternational espagnol n‚Äôaura pas vraiment eu le temps de se faire remarquer, la faute √† une blessure musculaire l‚Äôobligeant √† quitter ses partenaires pr√©matur√©ment (39e). Remplac√© par Sergi Roberto qui s‚Äôest charg√© de tenir le couloir droit de la d√©fense barcelonaise. Face √† la p√©pite anglaise Jadon Sancho, il a eu du mal √† s‚Äôimposer. Offensivement, il s‚Äôest montr√© plut√¥t discret en seconde p√©riode, √† l‚Äôimage du reste de son √©quipe.Icon Sport



Cl√©ment Lenglet : 5,5/10Lenglet est en train de devenir le vrai patron de la d√©fense du Bar√ßa. Il a certes √©t√© moins expos√© que ses autres comp√®res, mais cela ne l‚Äôa pas emp√™ch√© d‚Äô√™tre assez serein lors de ses sorties dans les pieds d‚ÄôAlcacer ou encore dans le jeu a√©rien sur les coups de pied arr√™t√©s.Icon Sport



Gerard Piqu√© : 5/10Moins serein que Cl√©ment Lenglet dans l‚Äôaxe, Piqu√© a compens√© par son exp√©rience et son sens de l‚Äôanticipation, m√™me si cela peut, par moment, ne pas √™tre assez. On l‚Äôa m√™me vu √† plusieurs reprises se faire prendre sur des duels a√©riens par des plus petits gabarits comme Reus ou Alacacer.Icon Sport



Nelson Semedo : 4,5/10D√®s le d√©but du match, il a pu voir que sa soir√©e s‚Äôannon√ßait compliqu√©e. Face √† un Sancho intenable, que ce soit lors de son d√©but de match √† gauche, doubl√© d‚Äôun Guerreiro performant, ou lors de son repositionnement √† droite, face √† Hakimi, il aura subi les offensives allemandes, conc√©dant m√™me un penalty qui aurait pu √™tre fatal √† son √©quipe.Icon Sport



Sergio Busquets : 5,5/10Il a r√©cup√©r√© beaucoup de ballons en premi√®re p√©riode permettant aux siens de s‚Äôinstaller dans la dur√©e dans le camp des Allemands. Peu √† peu, il a baiss√© en rythme pour laisser sa place √† Ivan Rakitic √† la 59e, qui n‚Äôaura pas su faire pencher la balance en faveur des siens, malgr√© quelques bonnes combinaisons avec Messi.Icon Sport



Arthur : 5/10D√®s le d√©but de match, il a tent√© de prendre en main le jeu barcelonais en l‚Äôabsence de Lionel Messi. S‚Äôil a touch√© beaucoup de ballon, il n‚Äôa jamais pour autant mis vraiment en danger les Allemands.Icon Sport



Frenkie De Jong : 6/10Positionn√© plus haut que Busquets, il a toujours du mal √† se positionner dans ce milieu √† trois du Bar√ßa, malgr√© des qualit√©s techniques √©videntes. Il est devenu plus int√©ressant √† la sortie de Busquets lorsqu‚Äôil a r√©cup√©r√© la place devant les d√©fenseurs centraux, en r√©cup√©rant notamment beaucoup plus de ballons.Icon Sport



Ansu Fati : 4,5/10Pour son premier match de Ligue des Champions, la jeune p√©pite du Bar√ßa aura alli√© le bien et le moins bien. Toujours en mouvement lors de ses prises de balles, sa copie reste ternie par un jeu un peu trop brouillon. Apr√®s tout, il n‚Äôa que 16 an, qui a laiss√© sa place √† Messi, qui a √©t√© discret dans l‚Äôensemble.Icon Sport



Antoine Griezmann : 6/10Omnipr√©sent en attaque comme en d√©fense en premi√®re p√©riode, le Fran√ßais s‚Äôest d√©men√© sur le terrain sans pour autant √™tre r√©ellement r√©compens√©. Son entente avec Suarez est encore perfectible, m√™me si on a vu les deux attaquants combiner √† plusieurs reprises. Un match moyen dans l‚ÄôensembleIcon Sport



Luis Suarez : 5/10Des beaux mouvement avec Griezmann en premi√®re p√©riode et une belle perc√© √† l‚Äôentame de la deuxi√®me. Trop peu quand on connait les qualit√©s de l‚ÄôUruguayen qui n‚Äôa pas su se montrer √† son aise. L‚Äôentr√©e de Lionel Messi n‚Äôaura pas chang√© grand-chose √† cela. Encore un peu √† court de rythme.Icon Sport

Borussia Dortmund - Bar√ßa : les notes des Blaugrana




Si cela se confirmait, ce serait un v√©ritable coup dur pour le Borussia Dortmund. En effet, l'attaquant star du BVB est encore incertain pour la rencontre face √† l'Inter, ce mardi (21 heures), en Ligue des Champions. Bless√© lors de la victoire des Jaunes et Noirs face √† Wolfsburg en Bundesliga ce week-end (3-0), Lucien Favre esp√®re encore pouvoir compter sur sa pr√©sence comme il l'a indiqu√© en conf√©rence de presse aujourd'hui.




"On verra plus tard, m√™me demain"




Lucien Favre+11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Le coach suisse¬†sait √† quel point Reus est important pour son √©quipe et il va maximiser les chances de le voir jouer quitte √† attendre demain √† la derni√®re minute avant de prendre une d√©cision : "Nous nous sommes entra√Æn√©s dimanche et lundi matin. Je ne sais pas encore si Marco pourra jouer. On verra plus tard, m√™me demain."

text:
Champions League
Borussia Dortmund: Reus, flat against Inter?
Borussia Dortmund's German striker Marco Reus is doubtful for the Champions League match against Inter Milan.
04 Nov 2019, 21:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen: 8.5 / 10Very clearly the man of the match on the Barcelona side. From the beginning of the match, he won a first match against Reus, as if to announce the continuation of an XXL performance, while passing the Reus penalty (again) with a baffling ease, then winning in two times, still facing the captain of Dortmund. And when it was too short, it was his crossbar that came to save him on the Brandt mine crashing on the amount. Definitely one of the best in the world at his job.Icon Sport



Jordi Alba: Not ratedLess offensive than usual, the Spanish international will not really have time to be noticed, the fault of a muscular injury forcing him to leave his partners prematurely (39th). Replaced by Sergi Roberto, who took charge of keeping the right wing of the Barcelona defense. Faced with the English nugget Jadon Sancho, he struggled to win. Offensively, he was rather discreet in the second half, like the rest of his team.Icon Sport



Clement Lenglet: 5.5 / 10Lenglet is becoming the true boss of Bar√ßa's defense. He was certainly less exposed than his other accomplices, but that did not prevent him from being quite serene during his exits in the feet of Alcacer or even in the aerial game on the set pieces.Icon Sport



Gerard Piqu√©: 5/10 Less calm than Clement Lenglet in the axis, Piqu√© has compensated with his experience and his sense of anticipation, even if it can, at times, not be enough. He has even been seen repeatedly on aerial duels by smaller players like Reus or Alacacer.Icon Sport



Nelson Semedo: 4.5 / 10On the beginning of the match, he could see that his evening was announced complicated. Faced with an unsustainable Sancho, either at the start of the match left, doubled with a powerful Guerreiro, or during his repositioning right against Hakimi, he suffered the German offensives, conceding even a penalty that would have could be fatal to his team.Icon Sport



Sergio Busquets: 5.5 / 10It has recovered a lot of balloons in the first period allowing his people to settle in the duration in the camp of the Germans. Gradually, he dropped in pace to make room for Ivan Rakitic in the 59th, who has not been able to tip the balance in favor of his own, despite some good combinations with Messi.Icon Sport



Arthur: 5 / 10On the beginning of the match, he tried to take control of the Barcelona game in the absence of Lionel Messi. If he hit a lot of ball, he never really put the Germans in danger.Icon Sport



Frenkie De Jong: 6 / 10Positioned higher than Busquets, he still struggles to position himself in this midfielder of Bar√ßa, despite obvious technical qualities. It became more interesting at the exit of Busquets when it recovered the place in front of the central defenders, by recovering in particular many more balloons.



Ansu Fati: 4.5 / 10For its first match of Champions League, the young nugget of Bar√ßa will have allied good and the least good. Always in motion during his catch of balls, his copy remains tarnished by a game a little too rough. After all, he is only 16 years old, who has left his place to Messi, who has been discreet overall.Icon Sport



Antoine Griezmann: 6 / 10Omnipresent in attack as in defense in the first period, the Frenchman struggled on the field without being really rewarded. His agreement with Suarez is still perfectible, although we have seen the two attackers combine several times. An average match overallIcon Sport



Luis Suarez: 5 / 10A beautiful movement with Griezmann in the first period and a nice breakthrough at the start of the second. Too little when we know the qualities of the Uruguayan who did not know how to be at ease. The entrance of Lionel Messi will not have changed much to that. Still a little short of pace.Icon Sport

Borussia Dortmund - Barca: Blaugrana's notes




If this is confirmed, it would be a real blow for Borussia Dortmund. Indeed, the star striker of the BVB is still uncertain for the match against Inter, this Tuesday (21 hours), in the Champions League. Wounded in the Yellow and Black victory against Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga this weekend (3-0), Lucien Favre still hopes to be able to count on his presence as he said in a press conference today.




"We'll see later, even tomorrow"




Lucien Favre + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The Swiss coach knows how important Reus is to his team and he will maximize the chances of seeing him play, leaving him waiting until the last minute before making a decision: "We trained on Sunday and Monday morning. not yet if Marco can play, we'll see later, even tomorrow. "
